query:
UPDATE images
            SET
                cobbler_name = $2,
                flavors = (
                    SELECT array_agg(id::uuid)
                    FROM flavors
                    WHERE name = ANY($3) AND deleted = false
                ),
                distro = $4::text::distro,
                version = $5,
                arch = $6::text::arch,
                http_unattended_install_config_path = $7,
                http_iso_path = $8,
                tftp_kernel_path = $9,
                tftp_initrd_paths = $10
            WHERE name = $1;
